content: My rep most certainly does listen to me. I talk to him almost every week. And, he votes almost entirely in line with my frame of mind. When he doesn't, the first thing he says to me is, "ok Joe, I can explain my position on that issue". And, he does just that. I also keep in contact with my old Representative and the Representative where I do most of my volunteer work. They know me pretty well. As for my Senators, Voinovich is a pretty cool cat and I have spoke with him quite often. But, he is retiring. Brown is a POS. He dreads my call and avoids it at all costs. So, anytime I am in DC for a convention or he is here in Ohio I make it a point to see him face to face. You can get things done if you really want to. It is just that most people are more content to sit on their couch and complain.
